sentence.value: The STS-103 mission was accomplished in 120 Earth orbits, traveling 3.2 million miles in 191 hours and 11 minutes.
sentence.annotated-sentence: The [[STS-103|STS-103]] mission was accomplished in 120 [[Earth orbits|Geocentric_orbit]], traveling 3.2 [[million|Million_(band)]] [[miles|Mile]] in 191 [[hours|Hour]] and [[11 minutes|Eleven_Minutes]].
